description: Quillon is a Pokémon Trainer, researcher and member of Project Mew. He rescued Ash Ketchum and Goh from a blizzard while they were trying to capture an Alolan Ninetales in the glacial area north of Mt. Tengan. He was able to collect data on Regice as it`s an important Pokémon in the search for the origin of Pokémon in their Project Mew research.
name: Tsurugi
